variables.input:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(finding.id) OR isNull(object.id) OR isNull(dt.security.risk.score)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(event.provider)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else:"None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(finding.id) OR isNull(object.id) OR isNull(dt.security.risk.score)
| summarize rawValues = arrayConcat(arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(event.type))), array(null))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else: "None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(finding.id) OR isNull(object.id) OR isNull(dt.security.risk.score)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(object.type)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else: "None")

1.content:
# Security findings

Overview of the security findings reported by various products. Learn more about [Security events ingest](https://dt-url.net/1d63p0v).

5.title: Critical

6.title: High

10.title: Number of unique findings by risk

13.title: Critical

16.content:
### Affected objects by risk
Distribution of risk across the various objects that represent affected artifacts and resources.

19.content:
### Findings by risk
Distribution of unique vulnerabilities by risk and reporting products.

20.title: Medium

21.title: Findings over time by product
21.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(finding.id) OR isNull(object.id) OR isNull(dt.security.risk.score)
| filter  in(event.provider, $Product)
        AND (in(event.type, $FindingType))
        AND (in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel))
        AND(in(object.type, $AffectedObjectType))
// get the latest vulnerability finding report for the affected entity and the component of the repository in the registry
| makeTimeseries count(), time:{timestamp}, by:{event.provider}

22.title: High

26.content:
### Latest 50 security findings
Recently ingested security finding events.

27.title: Findings by type
27.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(finding.id) OR isNull(object.id) OR isNull(dt.security.risk.score)
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
        AND (in(event.type, $FindingType))
        AND (in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel))
        AND (in(object.type, $AffectedObjectType))
// get the latest vulnerability finding report for the affected entity and the component of the repository in the registry
| summarize findings=count(), by:{event.type}

30.title: Top 10 object types by risk

31.title: Top 10 products by risk

32.title: Medium

33.title: Number of objects by risk

34.title: Top 10 findings by risk and number of affected objects

35.title: Top 10 affected objects by number of findings

36.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(finding.id) OR isNull(object.id) OR isNull(dt.security.risk.score)
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
        AND (in(event.type, $FindingType))
        AND (in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel))
        AND (in(object.type, $AffectedObjectType))
| dedup {object.id, finding.id}, sort: {timestamp desc}
// aggregation and custom filtering
| fieldsAdd object.name=coalesce(object.name, object.id)
| fields timestamp, Time=timestamp, 
          `Source product`=event.provider, `Finding type`=event.type, `Risk level`=dt.security.risk.level,
          `Risk score`=dt.security.risk.score, Finding=finding.title,
          `Object type`=object.type,`Affected object`=object.name
| sort {timestamp, direction:"descending"}, {`Risk score`, direction:"descending"}
| fieldsRemove timestamp
| limit 50

categoricalBarChartSettings.categoryAxisLabel: Source product,Finding type,Risk level,Finding,Object type,Affected object

37.content:
### Affected runtime entities
Runtime entities affected by the findings (based on the matched object attributes, such as IP or container image digest).

38.title: Top 10 vulnerable host entities by finding criticality

39.title: Number of host entities by risk

40.title: Top 10 vulnerable container entities by finding criticality

41.title: Number of container entities by risk

42.title: Total ingested findings
42.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(finding.id) OR isNull(object.id) OR isNull(dt.security.risk.score)
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
        AND (in(event.type, $FindingType))
        AND (in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel))
        AND (in(object.type, $AffectedObjectType))
// get the latest vulnerability finding report for the affected entity and the component of the repository in the registry
| summarize count()
